How to install:
1. Run Heartwild Solitaire - Book Two_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Immerse yourself in Heartwild Solitaire - Book Two, a classic solitaire-style adventure featuring 280 challenging levels, an all-new branching storyline with four unique endings, and bonus levels that can significantly increase your score. Make card matches, collect bonus points for sequential matching, and gather unique level-changing power-ups to help you along the way. Plus, with random card placement throughout, no level will play the same way twice. Heartwild Solitaire - Book Two also features a romantic storyline!
